title: Sharing in Australia: a look at share trading
creator_credit: Cambridge Film Productions and David Milne
brief_description: An introductory program about the operations of the various Australian Stock Exchanges hosted by Australian actor Bill Hunter. Presents a brief history of stock exchanges and then shows how to get advice, how shares are traded and how share purchases assist companies.
title_for_label: Sharing in Australia: a look at share trading
